foxtrot
Class AbstractWorker

java.lang.Object
  foxtrot.AbstractWorker
Direct Known Subclasses:
AbstractSyncWorker, AsyncWorker
abstract class AbstractWorker
extends java.lang.Object

Base class for all Foxtrot workers, both synchronous and asynchronous.

Version:
$Revision: 1.2 $

Constructor Detail

Method Detail

workerThread

WorkerThread workerThread()
Returns the WorkerThread used to run Tasks subclasses in a thread that is not the Event Dispatch Thread.
Uses a C-style getter method to avoid clash with the static getter method present in subclasses for API compatibility.

See Also:
workerThread(WorkerThread)

workerThread

void workerThread(WorkerThread workerThread)
Sets the WorkerThread used to run Tasks subclasses in a thread that is not the Event Dispatch Thread. Uses a C-style setter method to avoid clash with the static setter method present in subclasses for API compatibility.

Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If workerThread is null
See Also:
workerThread()

createDefaultWorkerThread

abstract WorkerThread createDefaultWorkerThread()
Creates a default WorkerThread instance for this worker.
